metadata.name: Suspicious Modification Of Scheduled Tasks
metadata.comment: Detects when an attacker tries to modify an already existing scheduled tasks to run from a suspicious location Attackers can create a simple looking task in order to avoid detection on creation as it's often the most focused on Instead they modify the task after creation to include their malicious payload

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\schtasks.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /change ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /tn ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\desktop\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\downloads\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temporary internet')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\programdata\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\perflogs\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%programdata%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%appdata%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%comspec%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%localappdata%'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('regsvr32')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /k ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /k ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mshta')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wscript')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cscript')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('certutil')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bitsadmin')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bash.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bash ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('scrcons')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wmic ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wmic.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('forfiles')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('scriptrunner')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hh.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hh '))))

output.summary: Detects when an attacker tries to modify an already existing scheduled tasks to run from a suspicious location Attackers can create a simple looking task in order to avoid detection on creation as it's often the most focused on Instead they modify the task after creation to include their malicious payload

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown References: Internal Research, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/schtasks
